supertags.name: save-to-tana
supertags.description: Content saved from web pages via the Save to Tana Chrome extension

fields.name: URL
fields.description: The URL of the saved web page

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or summary of the content

fields.name: Content
fields.description: The main content from the web page

nodes.name: Save to Tana Configuration
nodes.description: Configuration node for the Save to Tana Chrome extension. Use the extension's 'Copy Configuration' button when viewing this node to extract the necessary IDs.

children.name: 1. Make sure this node has the #save-to-tana supertag applied
2. Open the Save to Tana extension options
3. Click 'Extract Configuration' while viewing this node
4. The extension will automatically extract all required IDs
